products.name: Cumin Seeds (Jeera)
products.description: Premium cumin seeds from the arid regions of Rajasthan, known for their intense aroma and earthy flavor. These seeds are carefully harvested and processed to maintain their natural oils and essential compounds.

products.name: Fennel Seeds (Saunf)
products.description: Sweet and aromatic fennel seeds with a licorice-like flavor. Perfect for digestive purposes and adding a unique taste to dishes. These seeds are known for their cooling properties and refreshing aroma.

products.name: Coriander Seeds (Dhaniya seeds)
products.description: Mild and citrusy coriander seeds that enhance the flavor of any curry. Sourced from the finest coriander plants and carefully processed to retain their natural oils and aroma.

products.name: Fenugreek Seeds (Methi)
products.description: Bitter-sweet fenugreek seeds with a distinctive maple-like aroma. Essential for authentic Indian curries and known for their health benefits and medicinal properties.

products.name: Dill Seeds
products.description: Aromatic dill seeds with a fresh, slightly bitter taste. Perfect for pickling and adding a unique flavor to various dishes. Known for their digestive properties.

products.name: Kalonji Seeds (Nigella Seeds)
products.description: Small black seeds with a slightly bitter, peppery taste. Also known as black cumin seeds, these are essential in Indian and Middle Eastern cuisine for their unique flavor and health benefits.

products.name: Ajwain Seeds (Carom Seeds)
products.description: Small, oval-shaped seeds with a strong, pungent taste similar to thyme. Essential for digestive health and commonly used in Indian cooking for their medicinal properties.

products.name: Chilli
products.description: Spicy and vibrant red chillies sourced from the famous Guntur region, known for producing some of the world's finest chillies. Available in whole and powder form.

products.name: Turmeric
products.description: Sourced from the renowned fields of Salem, our premium Turmeric is known for its vibrant color, rich aroma, and high curcumin content. Available in whole and powder form.

products.name: Nutmeg
products.description: Warm and sweet nutmeg with a distinctive aroma. Used in both sweet and savory dishes, adding depth and complexity. Available in whole nuts and powder form.

products.name: Cardamom
products.description: The "Queen of Spices," our premium green cardamom from Kerala offers a complex sweet and spicy flavor profile. These aromatic pods are hand-picked and carefully processed to preserve their essential oils.

products.name: Cinnamon
products.description: Premium cinnamon from the Malabar coast, known for its sweet and woody aroma. Available in sticks and powder form, perfect for both savory and sweet recipes.

products.name: Black Pepper
products.description: The king of spices, our premium black peppercorns from Kerala are known for their sharp, pungent flavor and intense aroma. Perfect for adding heat and depth to any dish.

products.name: Saffron
products.description: The world's most expensive spice, our premium saffron from Kashmir is known for its intense aroma, vibrant color, and unique flavor. Hand-picked and carefully processed to maintain its quality.
